title: travelplanner: Can you help devise a 7-day travel itinerary for 2 people, beginning in Salt Lake City and includes visiting 3 unique cities in Montana from March 16th to 22nd, 2022? We have a planned budget of $7,200. In terms of accommodations, we would like places where parties are permitted. Throughout our stay, we'd wish to enjoy various cuisines, including American, Mediterranean, Indian, and Chinese. Lastly, we prefer not to drive ourselves throughout this journey. (b87ba3d16587c151)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan with the `submit_day_plan` function for each day of the trip!

chat_history.content:
# 7-Day Itinerary

## Day 1: March 16th, 2022
- 9:43: Take a flight (F3829434) from Salt Lake City to Billings.
- Explore Billings. Here are some top attractions to visit:
  - Western Heritage Center
  - Pictograph Cave State Park
  - Moss Mansion Museum
  - Yellowstone Art Museum
  - Yellowstone County Museum
- Enjoy a variety of cuisines. Here are some restaurant recommendations:
  - Holy Smoke (Indian, Seafood)
  - Chakhnaa Wala (Mediterranean, Seafood)
  - Hong Kong Express (Seafood)
  - Tsui Wong (Seafood)
  - New Bengal Sweets (Indian)
- Stay at 'Sunny 2 bd + Private rooftop on best GP street' for 3 nights.

## Day 2: March 17th, 2022
- Continue exploring Billings. Some other attractions you can visit are:
  - Lake Elmo State Park
  - Two Moon Park
  - Wise Wonders Science and Discovery Museum
  - Riverfront Park
  - Pioneer Park
- Try different restaurants on this day:
  - Elation (Seafood)
  - Bakeyard (Mediterranean)
  - Apni Rasoi (Mediterranean)
  - Puppychino (American)
  - The Kitchen (American)

## Day 3: March 18th, 2022
- Spend your last day in Billings visiting more attractions:
  - ZooMontana
  - Shiloh Conservation Area
  - Rimrock View Pullout
  - Four Dances Recreation Area
  - Zimmerman Park
- Experience more of Billings' food scene:
  - Govardhan (BBQ)
  - Brothers' Bakery (Mediterranean)
  - Aggarwal Confectionary (American)
  - Viddya Chinese Fast Food (Chinese)
  - Love Crumbs (American)
- Enjoy your final night at the accommodation.

## Day 4: March 19th, 2022
- There is no direct flight from Billings to Helena.
- You will need to arrange alternative transport to Helena.
- Visit Helena. Some top attractions are:
  - Holter Museum of Art
  - ExplorationWorks
  - Original Governor's Mansion
  - Great Northern Carousel
  - Reeder's Alley
- Enjoy a variety of cuisines. Here are some restaurant recommendations:
  - TT Burger (Mediterranean)
  - Aconchego Carioca (American)
  - Palmshore (Italian)
  - Elma's Delivers (Indian)
  - Mocha (Italian)
- Stay at the 'Perfect Long Term Rental~1 BR- EAST 60TH STREET' for 2 nights.

## Day 5: March 20th, 2022
- Visit more attractions in Helena:
  - Cathedral of Saint Helena
  - Montana Military Museum
  - Lewis & Clark Interpretive Experience
  - Flying Giant Adventure Park
  - Helena Bike Tower sculpture
- Try different restaurants on this day:
  - Power Play Resto Bar (Seafood)
  - Cafe Turtle (Mediterranean)
  - Chaat King (Italian)
  - Lunch Express (Chinese)
  - Govinda's Restaurant (Chinese)

## Day 6: March 21st, 2022
- There is no direct flight from Helena to Missoula.
- You will need to arrange alternative transport to Missoula.
- Visit Missoula. Some top attractions are:
  - Missoula Art Museum
  - Caras Park
  - Montana Natural History Center
  - Museum of Mountain Flying
  - A Carousel for Missoula
- Enjoy a variety of cuisines. Here are some restaurant recommendations:
  - Wah Ji Wah (American)
  - MK's Chinese Food (Chinese)
  - Cafe Lota (American)
  - The Tiffin Hut (American)
  - The Yellow Chilli (Mediterranean)
- Stay at 'Sun-kissed & Spacious Queens Room w/ Full Kitchen' for 1 night.

## Day 7: March 22nd, 2022
- 18:22: Take a flight (F3805824) from Missoula to Salt Lake City.

## Total estimated cost:
The total estimated cost for this 7-day itinerary is $6,631.
- Flights: $496
- Accommodations: $2,045
- Attractions: Free entry, although some may have small charges.
- Restaurants: $3,000 (assuming $400 per day for food for two people)
- Transport: Cost of transport from Billings to Helena and Helena to Missoula unknown.

Please note that this itinerary provides a general overview of your trip, and you may wish to make further adjustments based on your preferences. Some attractions and restaurants may have specific opening hours or seasonal variations, so it's always a good idea to check ahead of time.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
